Extracting Malware from Malicious Word Document

Posted on March 19, 2015

We received today an obvious phishing email with a Word document attachement. It contained a new malware XML dropper we have been seeing recently. A quick search on Google returned an analysis by techhelplist.com. However, they did not show how to decode the payload. Below is a short video... Read More
